channel.title: Well, here's the deal
channel.description: I've been through the " Starting a Private Server (Read First) " Yes i did read it all, and i would like to know, how to get to the run and compile. I've been having trouble for a while, and need serious help, if you can help me and get it right, your gonna have a nice admin seat to my server.

item.title: Well, here's the deal
item.dc:creator: @pbrain30 pbrain30
item.description:
@pbrain30 wrote:

i think you goto make a compile.bat and a runserver.bat

this is wat u put in compile.bat::
@echo off
COLOR 08
title yourclientname client
“C:\program files\java\jdk.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp *.java
“exzactly the same as above line”
pause

Read full topic
